instructions.reason_for_call: You recently bought a laptop, but you want to exchange it to i9 CPU. If multiple storage options are available, you prefer 256GB SSD. If multiple colors are available, you prefer silver. You also have a pending order with five items (you don't remember order ID), and you want to cancel it because you no longer need them.
instructions.known_info: You name is Lei Li and your zip code is 85033.
instructions.unknown_info: You don't have an email. If the agent asks for payment method for the order modification, say you want to use your credit card.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hello... um, hi. I'm calling because I recently bought a laptop from you, but I think I made a mistake. I was wondering if I could exchange it for one with an i9 CPU instead?

message.content: Hello... um, hi. I'm calling because I recently bought a laptop from you, but I think I made a mistake. I was wondering if I could exchange it for one with an i9 CPU instead?

messages.content: I can certainly help you with that! To get started, I'll need to pull up your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your order? Alternatively, I can look you up using your first and last name along with your zip code.
